summary: The provided documents do not contain any information about Fred Scheer. All documents pertain to Robert Scheer. These documents consist of U.S. Army requests for National Agency Checks on Robert Scheer, an agent report summarizing his employment history, and a statement of personal history where he refused to complete an Armed Forces Security Questionnaire. The documents span from 1958 to 1967 and focus on investigating Robert Scheer's background, employment, residences, and foreign connections.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Fred Scheer has no significance in the JFK context as the documents pertain to Robert Scheer.
